gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Warriors 104, Mavericks 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Warriors win their fifth straight game as they defeat the Mavericks, 104-100. Andrew Wiggins led the way for the Warriors with 23 points and four rebounds, while Klay Thompson (14 points, two 3PM) and Stephen Curry (13 points, seven rebounds, seven assists, three 3PM) added a combined 27 points in the victory. Luka Doncic tallied 30 points, 12 rebounds and 11 assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort, his 20th triple-double of the season and 76th of his career. The Warriors improve to 41-34 on the season, while the Mavericks snap a seven-game win streak as they fall to 45-30.
